price: (26) One of the women said, "O my father, hire him. Indeed, the best one you can hire is the strong and the trustworthy."
arabic: قَالَتۡ إِحۡدَىٰهُمَا يَٰٓأَبَتِ ٱسۡتَـٔۡجِرۡهُۖ إِنَّ خَيۡرَ مَنِ ٱسۡتَـٔۡجَرۡتَ ٱلۡقَوِيُّ ٱلۡأَمِينُ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: qālat iḥ'dāhumā yāabati is'tajir'hu inna khayra mani is'tajarta al-qawiyu al-amīnu
